DOC.brief_summary: This single-center , open-label , single dose , randomize , two-way cross-over study evaluate pharmacokinetics , safety tolerability RO4917838 healthy Chinese volunteer . Subjects randomize receive single oral dose either 10 mg 20 mg RO4917838 , washout period least 21 35 day , re-dosed alternative treatment . Anticipated time study 70 day .
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study RO4917838 Healthy Chinese Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy Chinese male female volunteer , 18 45 year age inclusive time screen Healthy status define absence evidence active chronic disease disorder follow detailed medical surgical history complete physical examination Body mass index ( BMI ) 19 28 kg/m2 inclusive Pregnant currently lactate female History clinically relevant disorder Any history depressive episode treatment antidepressant History drug abuse within past 2 year positive result drug abuse screen Day 1 Alcohol dependence history within past 2 year positive result alcohol breath test screen Day 1 Positive HIV , hepatitis B hepatitis C infection Regular smoker consumption 10 cigarette day equivalent amount tobacco Participation clinical study investigational drug device within last 3 month prior dose Medical history significant drug allergy
